help.default: Policy that needs to be applied for redistribution of the specified sources into BGP
Source Protocol(s) which BGP is interested in. Multiple sources can be specified as comma separated strings when the same policy needs to be applied

createwithdefault.description: Attribute used to tell the cli whether an object can be created withdefaultref and/or default settings.  If this is false, all attributes must be set by user in order for create to be called.

defaultref.descirption: Object which contains defaults for the given object, the common case will be a global object.  Flexswitch Model may have defaults set in model they will be overwriten by what is defined here. If default is not set in model or defaultref, then a 0 (int), true (bool) and '' (string) will be used. This attribute will also be used on a deletion of an attribute within an object.  A 'no attribute' will set the attribute back to default

objname.descirption: object name to which references these attributes
